name: ALAIN SUCHON ULTIMATE FIGHTING
description:
This masterpiece has been made by Paz (art), Jean-Paul (story and art) and Joel (Unity + assistant). 
This game was our contribution to the Week Sauce JAM (May 2022), following the theme "Imagine a game you love is the sequel to an earlier, previously unknown, but recently rediscovered game. Make that game." We decide to go for a Punch'Out prequel.
This is our very first jam, and our very first game together. Our only objective was to spend some time together and have fun. However, we hope you'll spend several great minutes of your life playing this small game.

Credits:
Sound effects from gamesounds.xyz and mixkit.com, Pizzacrust logo made with designevo.com, game pixel art drawn by Paz, photo editing done with Krita, game dev with Unity. Original story by Janpol.
